main.name: Uğur (Ian) Pekünsal
main.description: I am a web developer with expertise in front-end development, integrating APIs with a user-friendly UI/UX.
main.bio: Web developer with expertise in front-end development and an in-depth understanding of back-end development practices and methodologies, thus able to work on both ends of a project to assist the team, balance the workload, and meet project deadlines.
main.contactmessage: If you have any additional questions, please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: Below is a list of my current skills. This list is an indication of how fast I can solve problems utilizing these technologies.

education.description: CCSAI Excellence in Academics and Leadership Award

work.title: Digital Content Developer
work.description:
Develop engaging Digital Content and multimedia using HTML, JavaScript, and other relevant technologies.
Collaborate with SMEs and project managers to gather requirements and ensure content meets the desired objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather feedback, make improvements, and iterate content based on user needs.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description:
Integrate Microsoft Dynamics CRM with CMS systems.
Develop the front end according to wireframes and user stories.
Apply performance fixes to reduce loading times and decrease Azure operating costs.

work.title: Freelance Web Developer
work.description:
Develop and maintain travel management software.
Implement new features, test, and debug the software.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description:
Apply custom layouts to existing portals and fix bugs.
Collaborate closely with senior developers to understand requirements and design specifications.
Use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills to create visually appealing and functional layouts.
Participate in code reviews with colleagues to ensure the quality and consistency of the codebase.

work.title: Brand Ambassador
work.description:
Educated customers of various Muskoka and Beau's products via one-on-one interaction.
Submitted detailed, accurate reports for inventory, payroll hours, and material used.

certifications.title: Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM)
certifications.description: Professional certification in Scrum methodology, demonstrating knowledge and ability to facilitate and guide Scrum teams.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
certifications.description: Validation of foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
